title: aruLvaai
sahitya:
aruLvAi shrI mInna lOcani anaiyE en ammaNi ammA nI nijabhakti



anupallavi



teruLvAindaruL tiru AlavAi varu jagadishvariyE nariyE pari shei shokkEshapriyE
teriyEn



caraNam



nAn Ezhai kOzhai nAyaDiyEn narguhanishai nayam teriyAveNmati miDiyEn
koDiyEn AnAlum tAyE nAn un aDikkuDiyEn mozhi ancukamE sukhamE taru kavi
kunjaradAsanAm enakku
